app_description: Find or offer a ride in Bulgaria. Shared travel without public transport.
og_description: Find or offer a ride in Sofia. Shared travel without public transport.
click_route_info: Click on a route to see more information.
already_registered: You are already registered for this route.
route_in_past: This route is in the past.
route_cancelled: This route has been cancelled by the driver.
cancel_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this route? This will cancel all sign-ups.
phone_prompt: Please enter or confirm your phone number:
cancel_ride_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel your registration for this route?
no_rides_yet: You don’t have any rides yet
please_enter_date_time_and_seats: Please enter the date, time, and available seats for this route.
cannot_sign_up_for_own_route: You cannot sign up for your own route.
this_route_is_in_the_past: This route is in the past.
already_signed_up_for_route: You are already signed up for this route.
already_cancelled_for_route_contact_serv: You have previously cancelled this route. Please contact support to sign up again.
no_seats_available_for_route: No available seats for this route.
successfully_signed_up_for_route: You have successfully signed up for the ride!
only_route_owner_can_view_passengers: Only the route owner can view the passengers.
not_signed_up_for_route: You are not signed up for this route.
already_cancelled_for_route: You have already cancelled this route.
cannot_cancel_past_route: You cannot cancel a route that is in the past.
successfully_cancelled_ride: You have successfully cancelled your registration for the route.
